author: Michael Nienaber
title: UPDATE 1-Germany agrees to more aid to shield workers, companies from coronavirus hit
description: Germany's coalition parties on Thursday agreed to further measures worth some 10 billion euros ($10.81 billion) to shield workers and companies from the impact of the coronavirus pandemic.'
content:
(Adds details of agreement) 
By Michael Nienaber and Andreas Rinke 
BERLIN, April 23 (Reuters) - Germany’s coalition parties on Thursday agreed to further measures worth some 10 billion euros ($10.81 billion) to shield workers and companies from the impact … [+1856 chars]
